title: r/Askreddit Fast Food Workers, What Is Your "Sir, This Is A Wendy's" Moment?
description: r/Askreddit On today's episode we have two questions. The first is, "What story do you really want to tell but no one has asked the right question yet?" The second question is, "What is your best, 'Sir, this is a Wendy's' Moment?" So if you're ready for wild stories with insane Karen encounters, then today's Askreddit video is for you! Subscribe to my channel for more daily Reddit videos!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
